actions.name: CheckVersion
actions.description: Grants permission for IoT Device Tester to check if a given set of product, test suite and device tester version are compatible

actions.name: DownloadTestSuite
actions.description: Grants permission for IoT Device Tester to download compatible test suite versions

actions.name: LatestIdt
actions.description: Grants permission for IoT Device Tester to get information on latest version of device tester available

actions.name: SendMetrics
actions.description: Grants permissions for IoT Device Tester to send usage metrics on your behalf

actions.name: SupportedVersion
actions.description: Grants permission for IoT Device Tester to get list of supported products and test suite versions
